text: See this?!?!?!  Insanity!  Each injection contains multiple inoculations!  All the same dose a 300lb man would receive!  That’s right! They don’t alter the dose for babies! The dose is based on cells in the body, not weight or age!!! #sick https://t.co/5LQyYtZ8Yq
